content:
I apologize for my mistake earlier. You are correct that the title of Chapter 2 of "Truthspeak: The True Meaning of Five Key Christian Words Distorted Through Religious Newspeak" is actually "Sanctification: Finished and Being Finished." Here's a summary of the chapter in bullet points:

* The chapter begins with an explanation of the original meaning of the word "sanctification" and how it has been distorted over time.
* Halsey argues that the modern usage of "sanctification" has been shaped by a works-based mentality, in which people believe that they must earn or maintain their salvation through good behavior.
